Reviews.Title: “IT WAS LIKE A GERMAN SAUSAGE (ONE OF THE WURST)”
Reviews.Author: duboce
Reviews.Content: We booked 4 nights on line, stayed 3. We had 2 dogs and paid $20 per night extra ($10 per dog) The dogs were better guests than the others staying at the hotel. I could write a full page but will try to keep it somewhat brief. The room was okay, they try to do a good job but can't. Its in a horrible neighborhood especially during the night. Its a crack prostituteneighborhood. How do I know. while parking in a very tight back lot, we bumped a guest's car. No damage, however, he was a mental case, having seen him every evening shadow boxing in the back along side his car. His car was a junker, full of crap. i don't know what he wanted since he had no damage, but before it was over, the police were there at my request. They were on drug patrol in the area. They made a report and that was the end of it, we checked out the following morning with apologies from management. The other guest was a regular long stay. I have patronized Motel 6 properties for many years. Some are good, some are horrible. Its not the company, its the people who stay there. Losers, boozers, drug addicts, prostitutes. You name it and they are there. Unless you are tough, try to find another place. This place allows dogs which makes it easy to stay but there is a price you pay and I don't mean in dollars. Walk around the neighborhood in the morning. You'll see more bars than in San Quentin Prison. Res Ipso Loquitor. the thing speaks for itself. I have to laugh when I see foreign visitors write complimentary reports. If this is what they think about it, then their standards in Europe must be pretty junky and low.

Reviews.Title: “Don't DO IT”
Reviews.Author: Ste S
Reviews.Content: The worst motel I've never slept. It's dirty and should be refurbished. The linen was very dirty, and in particular the bed. I found bugs in the room during the night, and moreover there is a strange stink of gasoline at the second floor. My suggestion: Avoid it

Reviews.Title: “Puzzled by previous negative reviews”
Reviews.Author: Di S
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed here for one night. I felt the room was good value for money in a convenient location for us. Receptionist was charming on check-in and we had no concerns about cleanliness or security. Wonder what previous reviewers expect? I'd willingly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this Motel and neighbourhood!”
Reviews.Author: loobo
Reviews.Content: I've made a mistake not checking the property on TripAdvisor. Now I must agree with previous comments! For a first glance the building, corridors, pool and room looks dirty, worn out and creepy. Room was dirty, had stains on walls, broken lamps and ALL TOWELS were DIRTY and obviously not changed. Bed linen looked worn as well. We got terrible sleep while bunch of "Afro-Americans" were making so much noise all night long. Creepy people are staying there!!! Outside motel we have been warned several times about dangerous neighbourhood with risk of being robbed or assaulted after sunset. Staff rude and unhelpful. DON'T stay there making same mistake as we have done!

Reviews.Title: “Never again.”
Reviews.Author: Missauyeung
Reviews.Content: My fiancee is in the airforce and is stationed in louisiana so he came here to visit me for a week. On his salary this was the only place he could really afford, which was understandable. The hotels in encino where I live is very expensive so I didnt mind at all. Anyways, the manager seemed very cold and unwelcoming. We entered room 210 directly next to the elavator and it was awkward. The furniture was ok but the sheets had cigarret burns in them and the shower curtain was broken. There was a cocaroach on the ceiling we thought was dead but moved on the 3 day. The second day, the door broke and everynight there would be prostitutes walking down the halls with their clientel to the rooms with condoms in one hand and fast food in the other. It was disturbing to say the least. Just dont go there.

Reviews.Title: “Don't even THINK of staying here...”
Reviews.Author: visualspatial
Reviews.Content: My adult son and I stayed here one night. The rooms were filthy, including hallways, carpet, bedding, and walls, but the price was too good to pass up. Well, we should have passed. On returning to our room late at night, we discovered our electronic door lock no longer worked. After about 40 min. of running back and forth from the lobby to our rooms to prove to the clerk that our door lock did not work, the clerk gave us another room for the night. We slept in our day-old clothes with all our luggage in the original room: no toiletries and had to forgo vital nighttime medications. Harry, the morning clerk, refused to comp our room, stating that he comped the first room (well duh, we couldn't get in), but we would be charged for the alternate room, regardless of our not having our possessions with us. I called Motel 6's guest relations while standing in front of him, filed a complaint, and made it clear I would be requesting a chargeback from my CC company. Harry stood his ground. As we left, another guest who was checking out told us that he had run into similar problems with the (family owned?) management: "They don't budge an inch."

Reviews.Title: “This is nothing short of AWFUL!”
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at at least a dozen Motel 6's and have been happy - until now. This place is an absolute hellhole! Music is pounding through the floor below me, the room is way below average, bedspreads are filthy, etc. I am shocked that Motel 6 would sully such a great reputation for value with a seedy hole in the wall like this! I am leaving before I even go to sleep. I'm afraid I will never sleep with all of this noise and after reading the reviews on google (which I wish I read beforehand) I'm afraid of getting bed bugs! Yikes! This is nothing short of AWFUL!

Reviews.Title: “Inside Job Burglar DONT STAY in this HOTEL.”
Reviews.Author: Carlint
Reviews.Content: We stayed here a year ago and keep forgetting to write reviews how bad this hotel was. First as poeple mentioned, staff were very rude and don't know what customer service means. After a tiring day and upon return to hotel, our door was open and MISSING ALL our luggages including 2 LAPTOPS (new), jewelrys, and many more. Called the police right away to report and saw the people who stole our stuff in the camera. The manager was very unprofessional. The people behind this case is already in jail and sad to say I GOT NOTHING BACK. I lost total of $5000 just for staying in a cheap hotel like this.

Reviews.Title: “different kind of place”
Reviews.Author: OregonTraveler2000
Reviews.Content: First, no bugs of any kind which seems to be a growing travel issue. Even though the building is worn, somewhat foreboding, and located in not the nicest of neighborhoods, it was probably the quietest place I've stayed in all my years of travel...even better than some well known upscale places where hallway/room drunkenness detracted from my stays. There was free (unlike many other places) internet that worked well and fast so I could stay in touch with my office and parking was not an issue. It advertises a pool, but it is so small it is of limited use. This is not the kind of place that will entertain you but it can be used as a place to sleep, shower and kick back for awhile. The rate was pretty reasonable for what I received. Most of the people seemed ok, though a couple of the desk people seemed to have dark moods. Overall, this place was perfectly adequate for what we needed but it is not a place I would take my kids to for a stay.

Reviews.Title: “Manager needs training in customer service”
Reviews.Author: ConsumerD
Reviews.Content: We booked and stayed one night as we were attending a wedding that Sunday in nearby Woodland Hills. In the rush of packing and leaving, a cell phone was forgotten and left behind in the room. Later that evening we discovered the oversight of the the phone and contacted the motel and we were told by a decent front desk clerk that he would attach a note and the phone could be picked up Monday morning. Well my girlfriend traveled to Van Nuys to pick up and retrieve her telephone. The front desk clerk who is Harry Ho was very rude and condesending toward my girlfriend. He said he could not release her phone to her because she was not the person who booked the room. What the hell, the gentlemen that we spoke with the eve before said it would be no problem. He would not accomodate her request to make a call from the cell phone to me ; I was as work and could not accompany her back nor was under the impression that my presence was needed to pick up HER CELL PHONE. This guy was a real peace of work. She left and had her phone immediately turned off. We have decided to not provide any Comfort Inn with the COMFORT of OUR MONEY to line their pockets. We will also not recommend that any of our friends, family or coworkers to stay at a Comfort Inn or any affilate of their company.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and adequate”
Reviews.Author: SRButtaras
Reviews.Content: This hotel was clean and adequate. It doesn't have great curb appeal, but is clean, free breakfast and 24 hour front desk clerks that were helpful. Secured parking and courteous hosts. I will stay here again when in the area.

Reviews.Title: “A Dump, with a Night Manager to Match.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Not ever having seen this location before, my fiancee was booked for a late night arrival to stay one night before she had to appear as a witness for an administrative court hearing at a state building that is close by this motel. Upon entering the room, she was shocked at the smell and filth of the enterior of this facility and room. She immediately called me and told the night manager that she needed another room due to her asthmatic condition, that could not tolerate the smell of this room. She was yelled at, and told that another room would cost her double. When she advised she could not stay at this motel, this so called night manager, that only identified himself as Peter, but refused to give his last name, yelled at her, cursed her, used profanity towards her, and refused to allow her to leave the premises unless she signed the receipt. When she called me again, she was crying and near a panic. I talked to this guy and told him I would call the police if he did not release her immediately, and he hung up on me. When I was finally able to re-contact my fiancee on her cell phone, she was already driving away from this motel, and was having a asthmatic and panic attack from the abuse that she received from this night manager. I told her to book another upscale motel that I had looked up and she stayed at this Best Western for the night, instead, paying three times the cost. This motel is not only located in a drug infested area, but appears to be a drug infested location, so the management and owners get away with yelling and abusing their customers, without interference from the authorities. This information along with a formal complaint is being made to the city of Los Angeles, and the County of Los Angeles, Department of Consumer Affairs, for the abuse that my fiancee suffered at the hands of this guy "Peter" who refused to give his last name, plus he forced her to sign a credit card receipt, when she bolted out of this Dump. Travelers Beware, call the Better Business Bureau, and call the local police station, to know what kind of place this is before you ever stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Do not go there!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: DO NOT GO THERE...unless you like a place that looks like a crack hotel. The area is terrible!!!! The carpet is stained, the bathroom is very gross, the bedspread even had dried food on it. The hotel clerk is behind glass, there are notices of auto theft and frequent patrol of LAPD. We had children with us and didn't feel safe at all. We made reservations online for 2 nights and only stayed one and should have left before we stayed that one night. The whole place was filthy!!! Spend the extra few dollars and go somewhere else. They also tried to over charge us by $60. Beware of this hotel and others in the Van Nuys area!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “nightmare”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The worst Travelodge that I have ever stayed in and I woud never go there again. I stayed there 3 times just to give them the benefit of the doubt. each time with the same results.
